snippet.title: As the Light Goes Out Announcement Trailer | TGS 2022
snippet.description:
As The Light Goes Out is a professional simulation rescue game with emergency rescue organizations. You will become an emergency department manager to command the three departments of fire, police and medical first aid, and carry out professional rescue and disposal for different special events.

Coming in 2023.
